channel.title: United317.com || The Plain OS Feeling || Great Economy
channel.description:
Our website: [url=http://united317.com]United317.com[/url] Server started October 3 2014
Remember when you could just go to the edge market and buy some sharks and go pure pking with your friends? United317 is a rsps that is based on economy, and pking. Bringing the old rsps feeling without the boring old interfaces just a nice combat system and economy, and most of all playing for the fun.
Note: Remake of a server once called CrisisX, with few new features that are going to make it even better :)
Features
Small info: Every skill is functioning(not 100% like runescape, because its a rsps, that has a rsps feeling) Every skill will make you cash (except firemaking) Great economy! (Armors/Weapons shops up to rune, Monsters drops your stuff from slayer like runescape). Improved Really good combat formulas
Skills/Economy/Shops/Dupes:
As this is a old school based server, we are working on all skills so be perfected how to players want it to be. Shops only well starter items which are rune, limited runes, some skilling outfits.Players have to cook food, craft runes, farm for potions. Making the economy really
Training: We have 5 fully working dungeons:
Taverly Dungeon Bremhaven Duneon Slayer Tower. Giants Island. Fremennik Dungeon Dagg lair(Same ones as the deltas)
also while training you can make some cash or get your starting gear.
Bosses: All Os Bosses: King Black dragon. Bandos. Armadyl. Saradomin. Zamorak. Chaos Elemental. Dagganoth kings.
Minigames: Every week we are going to run automatic 1x1 event from all players. Duel arena with rules. Barrows (Fixed up mini game)
Xp rates: Combat 500x Skills 40x (Widly Influences economy)
We know its quite low xp rate for some people, but not really... But whats the point to reach 99 in 5minutes and have HighScores?
Our website: [url=http://united317.com]United317.com[/url] Server started October 3 2014
Media:

[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/11igvah.png[/img]
